summary.span: 作為所有 ASP.NET Mobile Web Forms 網頁的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET mobile Web Forms pages.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別繼承自 ASP.NET類別。The class inherits from the ASP.NET class. 若要指定在行動網頁並使用 ASP.NET 行動控制項，ASP.NET 行動 Web Forms 網頁必須包含下列頁面指示詞。To specify a mobile page and use ASP.NET mobile controls, an ASP.NET mobile Web Forms page must contain the following page directive. ``` <%@ Page Inherits="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage" Language="c#" %> ``` `Inherits` 屬性 (Attribute) 是必要項。The `Inherits` attribute is required. `Language`必要時屬性設定為在頁面上，使用的語言。The `Language` attribute is set to the language that is used on the page, if it is needed. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 行動網頁允許多個行動裝置的表單，在每個頁面上，而每個分頁只能有一個表單可讓 ASP.NET Web 網頁。ASP.NET mobile pages allow for multiple mobile forms on each page, whereas ASP.NET Web pages allow for only one form per page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一開始轉譯頁面時，會自動成為使用中頁面第一種形式。When a page is initially rendered, the first form in the page is automatically made active. 在後續回傳時，另一種形式可能會成為使用中，以程式設計方式設定這個屬性，或因為使用者瀏覽控制項。On subsequent postbacks, another form might be made active, either by programmatically setting this property, or as a result of user navigation through a control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property of a control. 如果目前的行動裝置允許控制項的便捷鍵，則按鈕會顯示送出表單的存取金鑰。If the current mobile device allows for access keys for controls, the button will display the access key that submits the form. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了介面，提供 ASP.NET 網頁架構`CustomAttributes`字典，其中可讓您指定其他屬性、 啟用或停用自訂屬性設定，或調整控制項的行為或轉譯。In addition to the interface, the ASP.NET page framework provides a `CustomAttributes` dictionary that allows you to specify additional attributes, enable or disable custom attributing, or adjust a control's behavior or rendering. 若要啟用或停用自訂屬性設定，您可以設定屬性`true`，或者您可以設定`allowCustomAttributes`屬性 <`mobileControls`> Web.config 的區段`true`。To enable or disable custom attributing, you can either set the property to `true`, or you can set the `allowCustomAttributes` attribute of the <`mobileControls`> section of Web.config to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 自訂屬性啟用時，屬性名稱中的印刷錯誤可解譯為自訂屬性。When custom attributes are enabled, typographic errors in property names can be interpreted as custom attributes. 例如，如果開發人員未正確指定"Txet 」 為控制項的屬性，剖析器會將它儲存為自訂屬性，稱為 「 Txet"而非引發例外狀況。For example, if a developer incorrectly specifies the property of a control as "Txet", the parser would save it as a custom attribute called "Txet" instead of raising an exception. 基於這個理由，預設會停用的自訂屬性。For this reason, custom attributes are disabled by default. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來啟用自訂`AccessKey`屬性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the custom `AccessKey` attribute on the . > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果您將它複製直接在程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if you copy it directly into a code-behind file. 您必須將此程式碼範例複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。You must copy this code sample into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 控制項建立來引發回傳事件的伺服器上的用戶端指令碼。ASP.NET controls create client-side scripts to raise postback events on the server. 它是惡意的使用者，可以將任意張貼事件傳送至伺服器控制項使用回傳的指令碼。It is possible for a malicious user to use the postback script to send arbitrary post events to server controls. 基於這個理由，ASP.NET 2.0 控制項驗證事件資料，以確保此事件由控制項所呈現的用戶端程式碼引起。For this reason, ASP.NET version 2.0 controls validate the event data to ensure that the event was raised by client-side code rendered by the control. 行動頁面不被支援事件驗證。Event validation is not supported in mobile pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回任何字元，請遵循問號 （？），在 URL 中的要求中。The property returns any characters in the request that follow the question mark (?) in the URL. 這個值可以不同於屬性。This value can be different from the property. 針對裝置而唯一的檔案路徑後置詞插入回傳的 URL，這個屬性將會自動移除檔案路徑後置詞。For devices where a unique file path suffix is inserted into a URL for postback, this property automatically strips out the file path suffix. 比方說，如果原始的查詢是 「 / home.aspx?id=john+doe"的值屬性會是"id = john doe"。For example, if the original query is "/home.aspx?id=john+doe", the value of the property will be "id=john+doe". URL 可能是下列回傳"/home.aspx?_ufps=20292303920 與 id = john doe"。A following postback URL could be "/home.aspx?_ufps=20292303920&id=john+doe". 在這個最後一個回傳值屬性一次會是"id = john doe"，因為移除唯一的尾碼。On this last postback, the value of the property will again be "id=john+doe", because the unique suffix will be stripped out. > [!CAUTION] > 如果索引鍵/值組的索引鍵部分儲存在屬性等同於上控制項的屬性物件、 檢視狀態和索引鍵/值組會從屬性。If the key portion of the key/value pair stored in the property is the same as the property of a control on the object, the view state and the key/value pair are removed from the property.
